page.title: 06Great Houghton Majorettes.
page.content: The{Great Houghton Majorettes}consists of 42 girls and 1 boy.We all play instruments and march about.As our special dress uniform we wear{red {jackets with red,white,and blue {skirts.}We have won lots of prizes, badges,and trophies.Our group has only been formed 5 years and we've already bought our own bus. The instruments we play are drums, glockenspiels,cymbals and tambourines. We know all sorts of songs,Eye Level, My Grandfathers Clock, A Walk Through The Black Forest and Annie's Song,to name but a few.We all pay 50p each week and Â£7.50 for the uniform.The committee,made up of mums,organises money raising efforts to help with the cost of running the group. We are lead by a{Mace Bearer}who walks at the head of the group and keeps us marching in time to the music.
